name: Night Light (itch) (Andrew Benson)
description:
Navigate through a hellish maze and survive the horrors within.

Player 1 -- WASD/Mouse to move; Space to sprint

Player 2 -- Arrow keys to move (use on screen guide for directions); L-Shift to emit a beacon

Concept, Code, Art and Sound Design by Andrew Benson, Johnny Dunn, Jasmine Martinez & Laurenz Rau
